com.salesforce.omakase.broadcast

Class ConsumingBroadcaster<T extends Broadcastable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salesforce.omakase.broadcast.AbstractBroadcaster
      • com.salesforce.omakase.broadcast.ConsumingBroadcaster<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of units to consume.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Broadcaster

    public final class ConsumingBroadcaster<T extends Broadcastable>
extends AbstractBroadcaster
    A broadcaster that will forward broadcasted units of a certain type to a Consumer.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConsumingBroadcaster

        public ConsumingBroadcaster(Class<T> klass,
                            Consumer<T> consumer,
                            Function<T,Boolean> customComparableLogic)
        Creates a new broadcaster that matches units of the given class.
        Parameters:
        klass - The type of unit to consume.
        consumer - The consumer.
        customComparableLogic - Additional logic function if return true then the consumer will be called. If false, then it will not be called. This function is used in conjunction with the klass attribute.
        See Also:
        ConsumingBroadcaster(Class, Consumer)

      • ConsumingBroadcaster

        public ConsumingBroadcaster(Class<T> klass,

        Creates a new broadcaster that matches units of the given class.
        Parameters:
        klass - The type of unit to consume.
        consumer - The consumer.
        See Also:
